channel.title: Undocumented Packets (Client->Server)
channel.description:
Packet 75: 3rd Item Click option, in inventory First Option: Buries bones(packet 122) Second Option: Wear Item(packet 41) Third Option: Unsure, (packet 16) Fourth Option: Use Item.. Fifth Option: Unsure, (packet 75)
I don't know of any items that use packet 16 or 75. a quick item dump would reveal them though :P Item on ground Options: 156 (First option) 23 (Second Option) 236 Pickup item (Third Option) 253 (Fourth Option) 79 (Fifth Option)
I Don't know why any item would need 5 options on the ground :P but whatever lol.
Only a few of these are undocumented, but now there is a "Name" to the packets in the client :) (If you want to label them, or account for them in your server so they don't cause crashes)

item.title: Undocumented Packets (Client->Server)
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Packet 75: 3rd Item Click option, in inventory
First Option: Buries bones(packet 122)
Second Option: Wear Item(packet 41)
Third Option: Unsure, (packet 16)
Fourth Option: Use Item…
Fifth Option: Unsure, (packet 75)

I don’t know of any items that use packet 16 or 75.
a quick item dump would reveal them though
Item on ground Options:
156 (First option)
23 (Second Option)
236 Pickup item (Third Option)
253 (Fourth Option)
79 (Fifth Option)

I Don’t know why any item would need 5 options on the ground but whatever lol.

Only a few of these are undocumented, but now there is a “Name” to the packets in the client (If you want to label them, or account for them in your server so they don’t cause crashes)

Read full topic
